item.title: Captain told passengers NOT to don life jackets?
item.description:
fox59.com
BRANSON, Missouri – Several members of an Indiana family were on a duck boat that capsized in Branson, Missouri, Thursday night, killing 17 people. The Missouri governor's office confirmed to FOX59 that eleven members of the family, including several children, were aboard the boat and nine of them passed away in the incident.
